Question
========

Which of the following bets makes the most money *in the long run*?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.90 chance of 10 euros, 0.05 chance of 50 euros and 0.05 chance of 5 euros loss.
* 0.90 chance of 5 euros, 0.05 chance of 100 euros and 0.05 chance of 100 euros loss.
* 0.90 chance of 0 euros, 0.05 chance of 250 euros and 0.05 chance of 250 euros loss.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.90 chance of 10 euros, 0.05 chance of 50 euros and 0.05 chance of 5 euros loss...: Correct
* 0.90 chance of 5 euros, 0.05 chance of 100 euros and 0.05 chance of 100 euros loss...: Incorrect
* 0.90 chance of 0 euro, 0.05 chance of 250 euro and 0.05 chance of 250 euro loss...: Incorrect
